title: Pixel 3 continously restarting (unless charging)
content:
Morning all.
I have a Pixel 3 and since last night it is just continuously restarting itself. It then begins to feel hot. 
The only thing that seems to stop it doing this is if I plug it into the charger. 
When it is not plugged in, it just keeps showing the screen as if I'd held down the power button and then restarting. 
I have no case on it now and have tried starting in safe mode but to no avail. 
Any ideas?
